sentences.english: The geomantic omen doctrine was very current in North Song dynasty and had much influence on the mausoleum system then.
sentences.chinese: 宋代陰陽堪輿術影響甚盛，陵寢制度深受其影響。

sentences.english: Economic momentum is slowing substantially in major economies and the global outlook has weakened.
sentences.chinese: 主要經濟體的發展後勁嚴重不足，全球經濟前景堪輿。

definition: study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
ancient Chinese divination tradition (still in use today)
to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)
arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)
(of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
Laizhou county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
to become known far and wide (idiom)/famous
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
